config.timestamp.column.name: LASTMODIFIEDDATE
config.query: SELECT s.LASTMODIFIEDDATE, s.FKORGANIZATIONNO, sx.pkproductno as id, s.fkstyleno as styleId, s.skusize as "SIZE", s.fksizeno as sizeId, s.skudimension as dimension, s.skucolor as colorId FROM vstore.sku s JOIN (SELECT FKSKU, PKPRODUCTNO, FKORGANIZATIONNO FROM vstore.skuxref) sx ON s.pksku = sx.fksku AND s.fkorganizationno = sx.fkorganizationno
